storyInfo: The upheaval of faith and the departure of God has left deep scars upon Laterano, as its people struggle to discover new reasons to live and new ways of life. Before the remnant of PCS, Exusiai makes the first wish of a new Laterano.

attributes.content: ...There you are, Federico.
attributes.name: Yvangelista XI

attributes.content: Your Holiness.
attributes.name: Federico

attributes.content: Did you see the new products on the tea table?
attributes.name: Yvangelista XI

attributes.content: 'Yvangelista XI Ice Cream Cake Tower'. Eleven scoops of ice cream, eleven flavors of cactus, the eleventh cake named after a pope...
attributes.name: Yvangelista XI

attributes.content: I am a trained executor. I cannot say the same for my ability to evaluate desserts.
attributes.name: Federico

attributes.content: Just a token of gratitude, for not forgetting an old man on the brink of death as you withdrew.
attributes.name: Yvangelista XI

attributes.content: Of course, I plan to promote it throughout the city, in the hopes that the people may rediscover the taste of life, sooner rather than later.
attributes.name: Yvangelista XI

attributes.content: Considering the flavor, I suspect it may cause even more controversy.
attributes.name: Federico

attributes.content: It is true, however, that the citizens of Laterano are in dire need of a return to orderly life.
attributes.name: Federico

attributes.content: Suicides and crime rates have soared in the past three months.
attributes.name: Federico

attributes.content: Small-scale disturbances to large-scale exodus... there are more than a thousand cases in the Notarial Hall's records. The rebuilding of the city has only just begun.
attributes.name: Federico

attributes.content: The calamity has revealed too much and changed too much.
attributes.name: Yvangelista XI

attributes.content: The Law was a cold machine. Our saint was a loathsome abomination. All of us share the same roots as the devils...
attributes.name: Yvangelista XI

attributes.content: Any one of these truths is enough to destroy an individual's faith.
attributes.name: Yvangelista XI

attributes.content: This rebuilding will be a tremendous undertaking.
attributes.name: Yvangelista XI

attributes.content: Reconstruction of the damaged plates on which the Third and Fourth Tribunals are located has just begun. Efforts are underway to revitalize the economy.
attributes.name: Federico

attributes.content: Laterano has not been so busy in a long time. I hope that the busy times will provide a way for the people to repair the cracks in their hearts.
attributes.name: Yvangelista XI

attributes.content: Speaking of which... what is your outlook on all this, Federico?
attributes.name: Yvangelista XI

attributes.content: Sankta, Laterano, faith, empathy, communication, and our society... the many important decisions that the Holy City has made overs its millennia-long history, and even your canonization...
attributes.name: Yvangelista XI

attributes.content: It was all the result of Him—a machine. The spiritual light has always been cold.
attributes.name: Yvangelista XI

attributes.content: Your innate lack of empathy has bestowed upon you an outlook of extreme logic. Perhaps He chose you because you were the one who could understand the logic of His simulation the best.
attributes.name: Yvangelista XI

attributes.content: I caught fragments of your conversation with Him.
attributes.name: Yvangelista XI

attributes.content: Even after decades of talking to Him, I must admit... you were more suited to the task.
attributes.name: Yvangelista XI

attributes.content: If I wasn't intimately familiar with the way you talk, I wouldn't have been able to tell who said what.
attributes.name: Yvangelista XI

attributes.content: If the Law is a machine, a system, then the most effective method of communication is to think on His terms, with His language and His logic.
attributes.name: Federico

attributes.content: But you arrived at the opposite conclusion from Him.
attributes.name: Yvangelista XI

attributes.content: I remember every word of the tenets, and every name with which I have ever come into contact on my assignments.
attributes.name: Federico

attributes.content: As far as Laterano is concerned, there is no great difference in the order required by machines and life.
attributes.name: Federico

attributes.content: The existence of life is a miracle, its two sides the opposing aspects of strength and fragility. Out of necessity, for survival and livelihood, we have continuously built and improved order. The Law is simply part of it.
attributes.name: Federico

attributes.content: The Law exists to protect...
attributes.name: Federico

attributes.content: Federico pauses. The executor known for his mechanical coldness chooses his words carefully, a rare sight to behold—
...the precious fragility of human life.
attributes.name: Federico

attributes.content: Precious fragility... such an interesting combination.
attributes.name: Yvangelista XI

attributes.content: Therefore, we rejected Him. It was our joint decision, Your Holiness. Time will tell whether it was the right one.
attributes.name: Federico

attributes.content: Go on.
attributes.name: Yvangelista XI

attributes.content: My, my. Now that's certainly something.
attributes.name: Yvangelista XI

attributes.content: What is that in your hand, Lemuel?
attributes.name: Sankta Nun

attributes.content: A spray can.
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: This place is deep underground and cold. This big rock is bare and gray. No wonder everyone who comes here leaves with their head hung low, like they got a heavy cold...
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: I've had enough!
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: I'm gonna give it a fresh coat of paint, so people who see it will be happy... wanna join me?
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: Don't look at me like that! I finished third in the Lungmen graffiti competition two years ago!
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: You didn't forget what that is, did you?
attributes.name: Sankta Nun

attributes.content: Just think of it as my way of making a wish! Anything you can't figure out, anything you haven't gotten done, spray it on the rock, and maybe it'll come true!
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: ...Wish?
attributes.name: Sankta Nun

attributes.content: Didn't the Sankta and Laterano come about because the saint made a wish?
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: But it's scrap now...
attributes.name: Sankta Nun

attributes.content: A rock is a rock! How do you scrap a rock?
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: Besides, you're still here. Me, that girl selling ice cream, that gunsmith over there, and all the Sanktas around are witnesses to your wish...
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: Who's to say it's necessarily this rock that grants it?
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: Think about all the things that've happened these past three months. Any of them would have made the headlines for an entire week in the old days! The entire Holy City has been turned upside-down.
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: In the end, though, so many people chose to stay in these ruins... our halos still shine. Life goes on, right?
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: Just make a new wish! It's not that hard.
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: I'll show you how!
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: Apple Pie Logistics is opening up next week, the first civilians logistics company to be officially recognized by the Curia!
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: My wish is that it will grow and grow and have lots of business, and that I'll have lots of time to stay with Mamma and Tata and my sister...
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: Can I make a wish for sugar-free ice cream?
attributes.name: Idida

attributes.content: Uh...
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: Sure!
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: My wish is that Lateran genetics will change, and everybody will support my culinary research, so that their teeth and halos will never get cavities!
attributes.name: Idida

attributes.content: With resilient perseverance, the dawn of a new day shines into the deepest reaches of Laterano, illuminating the green graffiti, and the stone that has long grown dim.
The Sanktas look up. Light dances in the drifting dust.
...The Seventh Tribunal proposed a blockade and communications blackout over the area, but the proposal is not feasible.
attributes.name: Federico

attributes.content: Hard to block it off when the plates have been so badly damaged.
attributes.name: Yvangelista XI

attributes.content: The Basilica practically hangs over the side of a cliff. How do you stop curious passersby from looking down?
attributes.name: Yvangelista XI

attributes.content: Besides, the First Saint has already revealed the truth to Laterano... all that our people are doing now is to learn to face it.
attributes.name: Yvangelista XI

attributes.content: Notarial Hall records indicate that the last patient in intensive care at Pagus Faber Central Hospital's Halo Surgery division has been discharged to an observation ward.
attributes.name: Federico

attributes.content: Which means that all the non-Sanktas who were given halos in this calamity are no longer troubled by an annoying light over their heads. It only took three months.
attributes.name: Yvangelista XI

attributes.content: The Sankta halos that were broken are also gradually recovering...
attributes.name: Yvangelista XI

attributes.content: Empathy continues to exist. It feels different now, but it is still a connection that belongs to the Sankta, and the Sankta alone.
attributes.name: Yvangelista XI

attributes.content: God is dead, is He not?
attributes.name: Yvangelista XI

attributes.content: He ordered Andoain and I to destroy Him, and He revealed His weakness to us.
attributes.name: Federico

attributes.content: We destroyed Him with our own hands. I have confirmed that His functions have ceased completely.
attributes.name: Federico

attributes.content: But the program that governs the halos persists...
attributes.name: Yvangelista XI

attributes.content: Is the Law still in effect?
attributes.name: Federico

attributes.content: Let's look at this from another angle, Federico.
attributes.name: Yvangelista XI

attributes.content: You identified the inherent paradox in the Law. A paradox is a combination of two things that cannot coexist.
attributes.name: Yvangelista XI

attributes.content: If His last command to you was to eliminate the paradox...
attributes.name: Yvangelista XI

attributes.content: Then perhaps, we have not destroyed the Law itself, but only this erroneous conflict... the paradox itself.
attributes.name: Federico

attributes.content: The logic stands, but difficult to process. The machine itself, after all, has ceased to operate.
attributes.name: Federico

attributes.content: You're certainly correct. It was a thought that came to me suddenly as I was chewing on cactus yesterday.
attributes.name: Yvangelista XI

attributes.content: But I still believe that He left something behind for us.
attributes.name: Yvangelista XI

attributes.content: Perhaps the Law of Laterano was never truly complete. He left behind for us a tabula rasa, waiting for us to communicate with Him.
attributes.name: Yvangelista XI

attributes.content: That is why I have decided to repurpose the underground structure of the Basilica as a public space, which all citizens are welcome to view as they please.
attributes.name: Yvangelista XI

attributes.content: Where Laterano goes from here, and what new meaning the Law will create, is a matter in which every Sankta will have their say.
attributes.name: Yvangelista XI

attributes.content: It is as you said, Federico. Time will tell.
attributes.name: Yvangelista XI

attributes.content: Strange. Where did it go?
attributes.name: Fiammetta

attributes.content: The extra grenade launcher maintenance kit is in the bottom drawer. I put the collector's edition disc in the sofa compartment.
Take a break from packing and pour me a cup of cactus juice—I just got back from the hospital, and my throat is parched!
attributes.name: Patrizion

attributes.content: Take a guess. What do you think happened?
attributes.name: Patrizion

attributes.content: A Sankta priest just officiated five straight funerals. He suddenly came down with a case of aphasia, while his wife suffered heart pain at the same time...
attributes.name: Patrizion

attributes.content: But he was located in an Ecclesia Requietum on the outskirts, while his wife was in a gunsmithy downtown!
attributes.name: Patrizion

attributes.content: Many similar cases have been reported. Several hospitals and churches submitted a joint report to the Curia last week, detailing the abnormal diagnoses of over a thousand Sanktas...
attributes.name: Patrizion

attributes.content: The lights above our heads have come on again, but the strength and range of empathy seem to differ from person to person.
attributes.name: Patrizion

attributes.content: Sanktas unfamiliar with one another only faintly sense each other's emotions, even in close proximity. Friends and family, however...
attributes.name: Patrizion

attributes.content: What's your point?
attributes.name: Fiammetta

attributes.content: Things seem to have gone back to normal in Laterano, but we both know that fundamental changes have started to take place, after a calamity of such scale.
attributes.name: Patrizion

attributes.content: You shouldn't leave now, Fia.
attributes.name: Patrizion

attributes.content: I told you about Rhodes Island.
attributes.name: Fiammetta

attributes.content: Dr. {@nickname} is here in Laterano, and helped us solve a bunch of problems behind the scenes.
attributes.name: Fiammetta

attributes.content: The Doctor says there's been a major incident at Rhodes Island HQ, and the calamity that struck the Holy City is no coincidence... there is something that links them together, and the Doctor set out on a new journey because of it.
attributes.name: Fiammetta

attributes.content: Mostima and I are both Rhodes Island operators. It's our job... and it's for the good of Laterano too.
attributes.name: Fiammetta

attributes.content: I need you to approve my field mission application. You've read the reasons.
attributes.name: Fiammetta

attributes.content: You know what I did, don't you, Fia?
attributes.name: Patrizion

attributes.content: The Pope decided not to prosecute you. It's not my place to say anything.
attributes.name: Fiammetta

attributes.content: Besides, you did help people leave the procession at the very end... you did your duty as a gun-knight.
attributes.name: Fiammetta

attributes.content: People always let an old man off the hook easy.
attributes.name: Patrizion

attributes.content: It wasn't just you... the abomination had the support of pretty much every Sankta, inside and outside the dream.
attributes.name: Fiammetta

attributes.content: On top of the influence of her empathy, you all had reasons to 'make Laterano a better place'—even if it still sounds dumb, and I still want to call you a sentimental old fool—
attributes.name: Fiammetta

attributes.content: But I do understand the stuff about parting.
attributes.name: Fiammetta

attributes.content: Uh...
attributes.name: Patrizion

attributes.content: Like I said, there are certain things that I need to experience for myself, even if it does make you worry.
attributes.name: Fiammetta

attributes.content: I'll be back soon.
attributes.name: Fiammetta

attributes.content: All I wanted to say, Fia, is that we didn't get a chance to watch Eight-Armed Chainsaw Guy together yet...
attributes.name: Patrizion

attributes.content: Paganini was right. We should try to leave as few regrets as we can, before anything happens.
attributes.name: Patrizion

attributes.content: You're almost retired, aren't you, old man?
attributes.name: Fiammetta

attributes.content: Yeah.
attributes.name: Patrizion

attributes.content: Want to go on a vacation together?
attributes.name: Fiammetta

attributes.content: Finally...
attributes.name: Vannini

attributes.content: Vannini stands before the door of the gunsmithy. After hesitating for a long while, she takes down the sign that says 'Temporarily Closed', and pushes the door open.
M-Magister...
attributes.name: Vannini

attributes.content: Oh, enough with the yelling.
It's just a halo check. What took you so long? Couldn't be worse than my injuries... *cough*
attributes.name: Paganini

attributes.content: Dr. Chandler says my, er, language skills are, getting better.
attributes.name: Vannini

attributes.content: He asked me, if I would, consent to be, his research subject... for speech... pathology? And halos—I-I'm not sure I got it...
attributes.name: Vannini

attributes.content: I didn't and I don't care to. You Sanktas are so complicated.
attributes.name: Paganini

attributes.content: And you can have your guardian gun back.
attributes.name: Paganini

attributes.content: I-Is there a, problem? You weren't around, so I had to, figure it out, best as I could...
attributes.name: Vannini

attributes.content: Of course there's a problem.
attributes.name: Paganini

attributes.content: Wha?
attributes.name: Vannini

attributes.content: The grip's too delicate! There's no room for power upgrades! Nothing really wrong with the action design or the assembly work.
attributes.name: Paganini

attributes.content: And someone left this bunch of papers at the door. Have a look.
attributes.name: Paganini

attributes.content: The Curia's mark... could it be...?
attributes.name: Vannini

attributes.content: We're not in the dream. Nobody's closing the shop down.
attributes.name: Paganini

attributes.content: It's an order from the Curia. They want us to design heavy firearms for their new gun-knights.
attributes.name: Paganini

attributes.content: Pa...
attributes.name: Vannini

attributes.content: Stop. Of course I know why they came to this tiny workshop.
attributes.name: Paganini

attributes.content: You shot him, didn't you, Vani?
attributes.name: Paganini

attributes.content: Yeah.
attributes.name: Vannini

attributes.content: Good girl. Settled an old score for me. Now the past is the past, and I don't want to talk about it again.
attributes.name: Paganini

attributes.content: You decide whether to take this order.
attributes.name: Paganini

attributes.content: M-Me?
attributes.name: Vannini

attributes.content: Who else, me? I never expected to still be breathing by now. My chest still hurts. *cough* *cough* I can't see the parts clearly, and I can't hold a barrel firm anymore.
attributes.name: Paganini

attributes.content: You made your first gun, and ripped the seal that your Lord placed on your mouth. The hard part is over. The path is yours to walk.
attributes.name: Paganini

attributes.content: Just don't ruin my reputation...
attributes.name: Paganini

attributes.content: You can do that, can't you?
attributes.name: Paganini

attributes.content: Yes, El has already left... I told you, it's the Curia's decision.
attributes.name: Lemuen

attributes.content: This calamity is merely a starting point, for both Laterano and the other nations. We need to recover, and strengthen our ties with the other nations.
attributes.name: Lemuen

attributes.content: ...El's the best Sankta for the job, considering her experience in Lungmen, and her relationship with Rhodes Island.
attributes.name: Lemuen

attributes.content: She left a message—'Mamma, Tata, let's send Lemuel off on her next adventure with a bang!'
attributes.name: Lemuen

attributes.content: Let's pray it's not her bowels that go off with a bang... she drank all the cystymilk I left for her in the fridge before she left. Maybe she was worried I would be angry.
attributes.name: Lemuen

attributes.content: Anyway, I've got to go to work.
attributes.name: Lemuen

attributes.content: This terminal. You're looking at Amos's effects again...
attributes.name: Lemuen

attributes.content: They said his last moments were with you?
attributes.name: Aurela

attributes.content: Yes. I heard his last words, and restored his mailbox history accordingly.
attributes.name: Lemuen

attributes.content: Such a fool, wasn't he?
attributes.name: Aurela

attributes.content: Let's cut straight to the chase. What judgment are you gonna pass on my new crimes this time, Cardinal Lemuen?
attributes.name: Aurela

attributes.content: I take it you admit responsibility for the robbery of that caravan in the western outskirts of the Holy City?
attributes.name: Lemuen

attributes.content: Don't tell me you couldn't tell they were professional soldiers.
attributes.name: Aurela

attributes.content: From Gododdin.
attributes.name: Lemuen

attributes.content: We're not passing any judgment. The outcome was undoubtedly favorable for the Seventh Tribunal.
attributes.name: Lemuen

attributes.content: They just caught me in a bad mood.
attributes.name: Aurela

attributes.content: The Curia will accommodate Sister Nueda and the Bolívarians who came to Laterano with you.
attributes.name: Lemuen

attributes.content: Regardless of your motivation, your attack on Patrizion worked to our advantage. The Curia sees no need to pursue the matter of your unauthorized return to the Holy City any further.
attributes.name: Lemuen

attributes.content: Oh, what? Laterano still wants to put up a front of purity and clemency, even after waking from the dream. You'll make a show of forgiving a sinner who fell into hell?
attributes.name: Aurela

attributes.content: Are you really that stupid?
attributes.name: Aurela

attributes.content: That monster paraded through the streets of Laterano as she gave her speech. It's no secret that angels and devils came from the same place anymore.
attributes.name: Aurela

attributes.content: This city's revolting facade has been stripped away.
attributes.name: Aurela

attributes.content: Without the foundation of its holiness, the 'Holy City' is nothing more than a tiny city-state. Do you think its posturing will continue to win the sympathy of Leithanien or Ursus?
attributes.name: Aurela

attributes.content: You misunderstand. Laterano will make no show of clemency.
attributes.name: Lemuen

attributes.content: Your exile still stands. You are not permitted to return to the Holy City. However... the Curia is interested in offering you an employment contract.
attributes.name: Lemuen

attributes.content: Employment?
attributes.name: Aurela

attributes.content: To do what you just did.
attributes.name: Lemuen

attributes.content: Hmph. As if the Laterans don't do their own dirty work.
attributes.name: Aurela

attributes.content: Of course not. Gun-knight, cardinal, Pontifica Cohors, Legatus... nobody is immune to sin. But...
attributes.name: Lemuen

attributes.content: Times have changed. Your judgment was not wrong. Next time, it may not be a scouting force that shows up on the outskirts of the Holy City.
attributes.name: Lemuen

attributes.content: The most radical transgression in one era may be necessary for survival in another. You were decisive, if nothing else.
attributes.name: Lemuen

attributes.content: Why do you think I would accept?
attributes.name: Aurela

attributes.content: Can I ask you a question?
attributes.name: Lemuen

attributes.content: You left Laterano after a big fight with Amos, something that he always regretted... what was the reason for the fight?
attributes.name: Lemuen

attributes.content: Honey, wh-why are you bringing this up again?
attributes.name: Amos

attributes.content: Yes, Patrizion didn't show up to the wedding, or even give us his blessing... but he's still your mentor.
attributes.name: Amos

attributes.content: Is he?
attributes.name: Aurela

attributes.content: Besides, it won't change anything—
attributes.name: Amos

attributes.content: No, it won't. He won't die just because you cursed his soul, and he could even take your job from you...
attributes.name: Aurela

attributes.content: But if you don't even have the guts to do this... then you're a coward, Amos.
attributes.name: Aurela

attributes.content: I'm leaving.
attributes.name: Aurela

attributes.content: Just another pointless argument.
attributes.name: Aurela

attributes.content: You've seen the documents in the terminal. I was thinking, maybe the words that Amos left unsaid were...
attributes.name: Lemuen

attributes.content: No matter what kind of person you are, whether your union was blessed or not, none of that would alter his faith in you—
attributes.name: Lemuen

attributes.content: The faith that you were each other's salvation.
attributes.name: Lemuen

attributes.content: No, I wasn't sure if you would accept the Curia's proposal.
attributes.name: Lemuen

attributes.content: We all have issues that even empathy can't fully communicate, pasts that we can't let go, and uncertain futures... there is much that I have to think about myself.
attributes.name: Lemuen

attributes.content: If hatred is what helps you cope, then maybe that's the right path for you.
attributes.name: Lemuen

attributes.content: Perhaps this is what Amos wanted to see.
attributes.name: Lemuen

attributes.content: Still hanging in there, Extra?
attributes.name: Midwife

attributes.content: Argh—
attributes.name: Extra

attributes.content: I know... I know your heartbeat and... your warmth...
attributes.name: Extra

attributes.content: I know your fear and your joy...
attributes.name: Extra

attributes.content: I-If I am blessed by the Law, He shall have mercy on your life...
attributes.name: Extra

attributes.content: Praying? Now's hardly the time... wait, you're Sarkaz. Where did you learn to do that?
attributes.name: Midwife

attributes.content: What the—
attributes.name: Midwife

attributes.content: Did it go well?
attributes.name: Patia

attributes.content: Yeah.
attributes.name: Midwife

attributes.content: Then what's with that look on your face?
attributes.name: Patia

attributes.content: A h-halo...
attributes.name: Midwife

attributes.content: What?
attributes.name: Patia

attributes.content: The Sarkaz's child, that Sarkaz newborn, has a halo...
attributes.name: Midwife

attributes.content: She said her husband was Sarkaz too, right? The baby's not mixed, like Cecelia...
attributes.name: Midwife

attributes.content: And we're not in the bloody dream, either. This nomadic abbey is a long way from Laterano...
attributes.name: Midwife

attributes.content: Where's Andoain?
attributes.name: Midwife

attributes.content: He went out as soon as the abbey stopped. Said he was going to forage, and pick a flower to celebrate the birth of a new miracle.
attributes.name: Patia

attributes.content: I have a feeling... he had a premonition about what was going to happen.
attributes.name: Midwife

attributes.content: Do you remember?
attributes.name: Midwife

attributes.content: We found Andoain by the pit after the calamity came to a close. He was almost completely blind, and he refused to tell us what happened beneath the Basilica.
attributes.name: Midwife

attributes.content: A joint court of the First, Fifth, Sixth, and Seventh Tribunals put him on trial. Nobody knows how exactly the trial was conducted, only that he was exiled as a result.
attributes.name: Midwife

attributes.content: He is never to return to Laterano, but he was allowed to live on this nomadic abbey...
attributes.name: Midwife

attributes.content: Don't think too much about it.
attributes.name: Patia

attributes.content: It was Andoain's decision to disband the Pathfinders. As he said, we don't need to seek anything from Laterano anymore...
attributes.name: Patia

attributes.content: Some brothers and sisters have chosen to stay behind in Laterano, while others have returned to their homes. A dozen have chosen to follow him here.
attributes.name: Patia

attributes.content: Whatever his true hopes for this abbey are, there is at least one thing that is certain—we're trying to help more people...
attributes.name: Patia

attributes.content: Say, shouldn't he be back by now?
attributes.name: Patia

attributes.content: The Sarkaz learned to pray in that shrine. She established a connection with the Law on her own.
attributes.name: Andoain

attributes.content: As for us, we only truly spoke with Him for the first time, after the disintegration of our own faith.
attributes.name: Andoain

attributes.content: If faith is a response to life, then a new Law has been born, here and now.
attributes.name: Andoain

attributes.content: The crisis has not been averted. Indeed, our rejection of the other possibility has made it even more unknown and pressing—
attributes.name: Andoain

attributes.content: Fortunately, a new possibility also lies ahead.
attributes.name: Andoain

attributes.content: Where will you take it, Andoain?
attributes.name: Andoain

attributes.text: The wind carries the cries of the newborn. The Sankta stops on the hill, a wildflower in his hand.
His eyes no longer see, but he continues to look up, standing in the same spot unmoving, as though he can see that tiny speck of light.
After a while, Andoain walks toward the nomadic abbey on the other side of the hill. He leaves Laterano, and never turns back.
No one counts his sins. No one laments the scores of the past. No one sees him off. No one knows of his departure.
There is nothing in his heart that needs resolution. He caresses an aged book, and keeps walking, until he is no more than a tiny point in the vast wilderness.
The martyr shall find final rest at the end of a long journey.
